description: A reimbursement agent that handles employee expense reimbursement requests. Automatically approves amounts under $100 and requires manager approval for larger amounts using long-running tools for human-in-the-loop workflows.
name: reimbursement_agent

skills.name: Automatic Reimbursement
skills.description: Automatically process and approve reimbursements under $100

skills.name: Approval Workflow
skills.description: Request manager approval for reimbursements over $100 using long-running tools

skills.name: Expense Processing
skills.description: Process employee expense claims and handle reimbursement logic
